snippet.title: Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #3
snippet.description:
Batman: Arkham Knight – Crime Fighter Challenge Pack #3

Batman: Arkham Knight – Season Pass DLC Videos Playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PL7N-XnsRG9lw96wNsxCJ7IWDaGr477D2p

***************************************************

Guardians (0:03) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 75,000 points.
● 02 - Score 50,000 points.
● 01 - Score 30,000 points.

Total Score: 278,195

Characters Skins: V7.43 Batman & Original Arkham Nightwing

-

Precinct (2:37) - Ranked Challenge

Combat Stars:
● 03 - Score 20,000 points.
● 02 - Score 12,000 points.
● 01 - Score 06,000 points.

Total Score: 93,915

Character Skin: Classic TV Series Robin

-

Stage Fright (7:01) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Perform 3 silent grate takedowns from 3 different floor grates.
● Take out 3 or more thugs with an electrical blast attack from above.
● Perform 2 separate fear takedowns within 60 seconds of each other.

Time Taken: 1:58.32

Character Skin: New 52 Nightwing

-

Chemical Reaction (9:57) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Take out all enemies without using detective mode.
● Take out all enemies without being seen.
● Take out 5 enemies in 5 seconds.

Time Taken: 0:52.45

Characters Skins: Batman & Nightwing

-

Vertigo (11:56) - Ranked Challenge

Predator Stars:
● Perform a corner takedown.
● Take out all enemies without being seen.
● Take out the detective mode jammer last.

Time Taken: 1:59.78

Character Skin: Classic TV Series Robin

-

Cauldron Speedway TT (14:57) - Ranked Challenge

Race Stars:
● 03 - Complete the course in less than 1:15.
● 02 - Complete the course in less than 1:30.
● 01 - Complete the course in less than 2:00.

Time Taken: 1:11.59

Vehicle Skin: 1970s Batman Themed Batmobile

***************************************************

Game available on: PlayStation 4, Xbox One & PC
Video recorded on: Playstation 4

PSN: TheArkhamChannel

***************************************************

This is a channel mainly focused on providing the Arkham fans with all the latest news, official trailers, and gameplay videos about the Arkham games. The channel is not affiliated with Rocksteady Studios or WB Games.

Subscribe here:
http://goo.gl/vx4waB
